title: How to lower coal contribution to CO2 levels? : r/CivVI - Reddit
body: Currently have a climate accord going on and I cant find the source of the coal output. All coal is coming from city states and I have no units that require it. Still at 269 for contribution to overall pollution. How can I lower it to zero? I think coal mines contribute to that. I think coal mines contribute to that.
readable_content:
eanderson954 (2018-12-08): How to lower coal contribution to CO2 levels?
Currently have a climate accord going on and I cant find the source of the coal output. All coal is coming from city states and I have no units that require it. Still at 269 for contribution to overall pollution. How can I lower it to zero?

iyad-a (2018-12-08): I think coal mines contribute to that.

- iyad-a (2018-12-08): I think coal mines contribute to that.

Kranthe (2018-12-08): This is my challenge for my next playthrough. No climate change, war on whoever damages the environment. -Teddy

- Harthhal (2018-12-08): that 269 might just be what you had at one point that hasnt been scrubbed
